name: Murder Forest (SoulCake)
description: A survival horror game heavily inspired by the early 2010s era of creepypasta media, Murder Forest sees William Withers in his quest to solve a long-forgotten mystery of the Warday Woods, a forest that has been undocumented for the past 76 years. In the process, he must also save his friends who have been captured by a mysterious entity that lurks in the woods. This game was made using the tools provided by tansuergene's Horror Engine Blueprint for the Unreal Engine.
